page.title: 20ROAD TRAFFIC ALONG THE A488
page.content: The roads in the area are all well surfaced but still narrow except for the A488 and care is needed when vehicles pass. The A488 road is 22feet wide.It carries a wide variety of traffic from agricultural tractors to 38tonne articulated lorries.There is a steady flow of traffic throughout the day with a constant stream between, 7.30am and 8.30am and 4.30pm and 5.30pm in the afternoon. This year there is controversy over the proposed expansion of Callow Quarry, Minsterley. In order to justify the expenditure the company will need to remove up to 360000 tons of stone per annum. This will greatly increase the heavy goods traffic using the village routes. This block has been produced by the boys and staff of Cruckton Hall School, Cruckton, Shrewsbury.
